alert.note: Alert for Alger (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 30 at 3:20PM EDT until May 02 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MONDAY TO 11 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches west of a Munising to Chatham line. Much lighter amounts can be expected between Munising and Grand Marais. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph along the lakeshore. * WHERE...Alger County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Monday to 11 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and Monday evening commutes. With heavy wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the stronger winds late tonight and Monday may cause tree damage and power outages. The wet, heavy snow will be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
